Sociology.1: Understand how social context impacts individuals, with an emphasis on the causes and consequences of social inequality.
Sociology.2: Describe how different types of research methods are used to study society and make claims about society.
Sociology.3: Conduct basic social research, to include developing hypothesis, collecting and analyzing data, and addressing any ethical issues involved in social research.
Sociology.4: Write and communicate effectively to diverse audiences, including being able to articulate key theoretical approaches and summarize research findings.
Sociology.5: Explain how social research can be used to create policy, design specific interventions, and/or address social issues.
